body.name: IZSOHHOME Push Broom,Tub Tile Broom Brush,Stiff Bristles Broom for Shower Cleaning, Patio, Kitchen,Grout and Garage,Indoor Outdoor Cleaning Brush,Adjustable Stainless Steel Long Handle-46.5"…

features: 1.【STIFF BRISTLE SCRUB BRUSH】The bristles of this brush are made of resilient plastic, which is effective in removing stubborn stains from the ground,sturdy and durable.Doesn't wear the ground. These bristles resist bending to retain their shape over time.

2.【STRONG STAINLESS LONG-HANDLE】Three stainless steel rods can be assembled up to a maximum of 118 cm.Strong and rust-proof, easy to push without stopping or bending..The rods are tightened by threaded joints with locking, no need to worry about loosening that perfect for heavy duty dirts.

3.【Wet&Dry USE】The cleaner brush tool can be widely used in tile floor,pair with your favorite household cleaner to clean the hardwood floor, glass surface and cement floor like tub, bathroom, kitchen, shower, wall, garage and patio.

4.【HUMANIZED DESIGN】 45 Degrees Angled Floor Scrub Brush Head,Easy to reach corners and cracks without bending or kneeling down.Reduce the pain in the knees and back while do housework.A piece of sponge is wrapped around the pole, soft and hands-free.It won't get cold in winter.
5.【ESAY TO CARE】Wash it with clean water after each use, The hanging hole is easy to storage.The push boom come with a hook for easy cleaning and storage..

reviews.reviewText: Works exceptional on dog hair. Ease of use & floors look beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bristles are too stiff
reviews.reviewText: This may sound strange but the bristles are too hard to clean the floor with. You have to push so so so hard to get them to bend a little to do the scrubbing. Probably good on concrete floor but I hate it for my tile with grout. It’s just too stiff to work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great for getting hair off carpet...
reviews.reviewText: I got this push broom to sweep off rocks from a concrete section on my street. I haven't had time to attempt that yet, so don't know if it will work for that. I just received the broom. Thought I would try it on my carpet, and it works GREAT to get hair out/off. My carpet is low pile, so that could affect people's results. Also too early to tell how sturdy or longlasting it will be, since I've only used it once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Less than an week old, only used once and the handle/pole is starting to rust. Not sturdy and cheaply made.

reviews.reviewText: Perfect to clean grout and any mold on shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend for the bathroom tub and wall tile. Bristles are hard but not too hard to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: It can be used for both wet and dry cleaning
reviews.reviewText: This brush is equipped with stiff bristles made of resilient plastic, making it highly effective in removing stubborn stains from the ground. Not only that, but these bristles are also sturdy and durable, helping to ensure that they won't wear down the ground.This scrub brush features a strong stainless long handle. With three stainless steel rods that can be assembled up to a maximum of 118 cm, this brush is both strong and rust-proof. I found it easy to push without any stopping or bending, even when faced with heavy-duty dirt. The threaded joints with locking also ensure that the rods stay securely tightened, so there's no need to worry about any loosening.It can be used for both wet and dry cleaning, making it suitable for a wide range of surfaces. Whether it's tile floors, hardwood floors, glass surfaces, or cement floors like tubs, bathrooms, kitchens, showers, walls, garages, and patios, this brush gets the job done effortlessly.The humanized design of this scrub brush is another aspect that I appreciate. The 45-degree angled floor scrub brush head allows me to easily reach corners and cracks without having to bend or kneel down. This not only saves me time and effort but also reduces the strain on my knees and back while doing housework. Additionally, the piece of sponge wrapped around the pole adds a soft and hands-free touch, which is especially helpful during the colder months.Maintaining this brush isn't complex. After each use, I simply wash it with clean water and hang it up using the conveniently included wall mount. The push boom even comes with a hook for easy cleaning and storage, making it user-friendly to keep this brush in top-notch condition.I'd recommend the Izsohhome Deck Scrub Brush. Its stiff bristles, strong stainless long handle, versatility, and humanized design make it a fantastic tool for any cleaning task. Not to mention, its easy maintenance adds to its appeal. If you're in need of a reliable and durable scrub brush, look no further than this one.
